meanings.definition: Adjusts or distributes in a balanced or harmonious way.
meanings.sent1: She proportionates the ingredients carefully to make a delicious cake.
meanings.sent2: The chef proportionates the spices to create a flavorful dish.
meanings.sent3: The cat proportionates its time between napping and exploring the garden.
meanings.sent4: His calming voice proportionates peace to everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The teacher proportionates attention to each student's needs.

meanings.definition: Corresponds in size or amount to something else.
meanings.sent1: The proportionates boxes were neatly stacked in the warehouse.
meanings.sent2: She chose the proportionates curtains that matched the room perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The proportionates cupcakes were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: His outfit was proportionates to the formal event.
meanings.sent5: The proportionates pieces of the puzzle fit together seamlessly.

meanings.definition: Divides or allocates in relation to a specific standard or criteria.
meanings.sent1: The committee proportionates the budget for various projects.
meanings.sent2: He proportionates his time between work and family.
meanings.sent3: The magician proportionates his tricks to entertain the audience.
meanings.sent4: She proportionates the tasks among team members efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The coach proportionates playing time based on performance.
